		Question: what was scottie pippen known for
		Answer:
answer: Scottie Pippen was known for being a versatile and athletic small forward who played for the Chicago Bulls from 1987 to 1998 and 2003 to 2004. He was a key member of the Bulls' six NBA championships in the 1990s, alongside Michael Jordan. Pippen was known for his defensive prowess, his ability to score and pass, and his leadership on the court. He was named to the NBA All-Star team seven times, the NBA All-Defensive First Team eight times, and the NBA All-Defensive Second Team three times. He was also named one of the 50 Greatest Players in NBA History in 1996.
